attributes.action: Say NO to taxpayers paying for Westminster Gym Refurbishment
attributes.additional_details: The tax payer is being used to fund a £250,000 refurbishment of the Westminster Gym.This gym can only used by parliamentary pass holders and is a perk. Many people can barely afford to turn on central heating let alone afford swanky private gyms and I am asking that as many people as possible lend their support calling for this refurbishment at our expense to be scrapped
